name: Bulan Mimpi
description:
Bulan Mimpi is a contemplative exploration puzzle game. 

You embody an astronaut who crash landed on an unknown planet and who must find  a way to get back home. After discovering the ghosts of a lost civilisation that onced lived here, you find out that  an old alien ship hides somewhere on this planet. 

You then go explore the area to try and find clues as to where it may be. To do it you will try not to run out of oxygen by building generators using the moon’s  ressources and sink deeper into the unknown...
